messages.title: Education
messages.content: Introduce a Pupil Premium for Primary Schools to close the performance gap between children from rich and poor families.

messages.title: NHS & Health
messages.content: We will cut back on bureaucracy and waste, including abolishing strategic health authorities and slimming down the central Department of Health to free up money for front-line services. We will scrap central targets and guarantee that you get your treatment on time.

messages.title: Green issues
messages.content: Liberal Democrats will drive a sustainable programme of investment in renewable energy sources such as wind, wave and solar, creating hundreds-of-thousands of jobs, oppose construction of further nuclear power stations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce a Pupil Premium for Primary Schools to close the performance gap between children from rich and poor families. Reduce class sizes, select teachers free to spend more time in the classroom, and make one to one tuition possible for children who need it most. Liberal Democrats are the only party which believes university education should be free and are committed to abolishing tuition fees.

Liberal Democrats will cut back on bureaucracy and waste, including abolishing strategic health authorities and slimming down the central Department of Health to free up money for front-line services. We will scrap central targets and guarantee that you get your treatment on time.

Liberal Democrats will drive a sustainable programme of investment in renewable energy sources such as wind, wave and solar, creating hundreds-of-thousands of jobs, oppose construction of further nuclear power stations.

I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns and represent you. I will make sure your voice is heard locally and at Westminster. I will be a strong voice for Kingswood.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Four steps to a fairer Britain
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1. Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket: Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700. 2. A fair chance for every child: Smaller class sizes, more cash for schools and lots more one-to-one teaching. 3. A fair future: create jobs by making Britain greener: Invest in public transport, renewable energy and efficient homes. 4. A fair deal for you from the politicians: Make politicians accountable and the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.education: Introduce a Pupil Premium for Primary Schools to close the performance gap between children from rich and poor families. Reduce class sizes, select teachers free to spend more time in the classroom, and make one to one tuition possible for children who need it most. Liberal Democrats are the only party which believes university education should be free and are committed to abolishing tuition fees.

issues.governance: Make politicians accountable and the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: Liberal Democrats will cut back on bureaucracy and waste, including abolishing strategic health authorities and slimming down the central Department of Health to free up money for front-line services. We will scrap central targets and guarantee that you get your treatment on time.

leaflet.personalStatement: Sally FitzHarris grew up in Gloucestershire; she did a first degree at Oxford University as a mature student and a second degree in London. She has been a strong supporter of lifelong learning. She retrained as a journalist when her children grew up. Her first husband left behind a sizeable estate in south London that she has redesigned opening her home and garden to some of the worst-off members of that community.
